item.title: Using the Azure IoT DevKit with Linux
item.description: For a while now, I’ve had an interest in playing with IoT devices to do interesting things. I consider myself a novice (at best) with electronic components, so I wanted an all-in-one unit to get started. I recently borrowed an Azure IoT DevKit, which has lots of interesting little sensors on board, and a lot of getting started resources. More precisely, this is a MXChip AZ1366 The Problem ðŸ”—I’ve been running Ubuntu 16.
